t: Amazon.com: Best of The Rest: CDs & Vinyl
s: There is little reason for this CD to exist given all the compilations and live albums from Lynyrd Skynyrd released since "Best of the Rest" came out. The majority of the CD is studio tracks released on the regular LP's. "Workin for MCA" is an undistinguished live rendition. "T for Texas" is worth ...

t: Little Texas - Very Best of Little Texas: Live & Loud - Amazon.com Music

s: The discs lay flat within the box ... of the cd cases. The box has all of the tracks printed on the back. Overall this looks like an amazing effort to put this together with 330 tracks of rare music from small, defunct labels. Add the great book and the quality packaging and this is really an amazing collection! Well done by Be! Sharp records. If you like this type of music from this era and with a Texas twist, you ...
